p: The prospects for the usage of plant EOs and the chemical compounds that they contain for the production of packaging for food products are also promising. Nanoencapsulates, polymers and nanoemulsions are suitable for packaging. As a result, bioactive agents are slowly released, and the shelf life of the product is extended [ 39]. Efforts are also underway to unblock the placing on the market of products containing botanical pesticides, and the so-called “low-risk” ones have fewer stringent regulatory requirements [ 25, 40].
